definition: to flow/to disseminate/to circulate or spread/to move or drift/to degenerate/to banish or send into exile/stream of water or sth resembling one/class, rate or grade

sentences.english: The spring water is of dark green, deep and running all the year round.
sentences.chinese: 泉水碧綠凝重，深不見底，終年湧流不息。

sentences.english: The grid shimmers with " current" or grid flux.
sentences.chinese: 網格以“湧流”或網格流動變化輕輕震顫着。

sentences.english: If challenges are too low, one gets back to flow by increasing them.
sentences.chinese: 如果挑戰太容易，我們可以增加挑戰以回到湧流。

sentences.english: Surge irrigation is a new kind of water saving technique for surface irrigation.
sentences.chinese: 湧流灌溉是一種節水型地面灌溉新技術。

sentences.english: How often do people experience flow?
sentences.chinese: 人們經歷湧流的頻率如何？

sentences.english: You can hear the blood rushing through your head.
sentences.chinese: 你可以聽到血液在頭部湧流的聲音。

sentences.english: It is the fresh of the deep spring of life.
sentences.chinese: 青春是生命深泉在湧流。

sentences.english: These exceptional moments are what I have called "flow" experiences.
sentences.chinese: 這些非同尋常的時機就是我所謂的“湧流”經歷。

sentences.english: Where rivers of delight shall ever roll.
sentences.chinese: 喜樂河滾滾，湧流何久常。

sentences.english: The primary causes forming low-latitude arid region are cold ocean current and upwelling current.
sentences.chinese: 低緯旱區的成因主要是冷洋流和上湧流。

sentences.english: It is the full involvement of flow, rather than happiness, that makes for excellence in life.
sentences.chinese: 完全投入到湧流而非幸福之中，讓生活卓越。

sentences.english: It is the freshneof the deep spring of life.
sentences.chinese: 罠青春是生命的深泉在湧流。
